description.full: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, Spanish.  From the makers of Toy Story 3: The Videogame comes Cars 2: The Video Game, where players can jump into the Cars 2 universe with some of their favorite Cars personalities in locations around the globe. Train to become an agent of C.H.R.O.M.E. (Command Headquarters for Recon Operations & Motorized Espionage) and take on dangerous missions, compete to become the fastest racecar in the world, or use your spy skills in exciting, action-packed combat racing!
description.short: • Train to become a world-class spy with over 20 characters, such as Mater, Lightning McQueen and the newly introduced Finn McMissile and Holley Shiftwell. • Take on dangerous missions using high-tech gadgets. • Perform maneuvers only Cars characters can do, like backwards driving, air tricks, sidestepping to avoid obstacles, two wheel driving and more.
